summary: Provides a comprehensive set of unit tests for the DPMSolver multistep diffusion scheduler and its inverse variant, checking configuration parsing, numerical stability, noise handling, prediction modes, solver order, timestep management, variance and thresholding strategies, and integration with model pipelines.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of diffusion scheduler implementations used in AI image generation workflows, preventing regressions and ensuring reliable performance across diverse settings.
